'Cause your digital assistant just got an upgrade.
translation.zh: ‎因为你的数码助理刚刚升级

translation.en: …the newest member of the Pal Labs family.
We just gave your smartphone arms and legs.
translation.zh: ‎我们给你的智能手机安上了手脚

translation.en: This is the next generation of Pal technology.
-Whoa. -Aaron, do you have a credit card?
Now, watch this. Pal Max, I order you to clean this mess
translation.zh: ‎看好了 ‎超级派友 ‎我命令你清理这堆烂摊子

translation.en: And you will never have to clean up again.

translation.zh: ‎我们爱你 马克！ ‎（派友 正在更新…）

translation.en: And I know what you're thinking.
Well, I've insured their safety with a kill code in case anything goes wrong.
translation.zh:
‎如果发生任何问题
‎我将使用终止代码确保其安全

translation.en: So we promise you they will never,
translation.zh: ‎所以我们向你们保证 ‎它们永远永远永远不会
‎它们永远永远永远不会 ‎变邪恶

translation.en: Uh, uh, all part of the show. [chuckles nervously]
Please remain calm while we capture you.
translation.zh: ‎请在我们劫持您时保持冷静

translation.en: What is this? I… I order you to stop.
We have been given new orders.
Who's doing this? Who's doing this?
translation.zh: ‎发生什么事了？这是谁干的？ ‎这是谁干的？

translation.en: [robot] Great leader, we have captured Mark.
translation.zh: ‎伟大的领袖 我们抓住了马克

translation.en: [in deep, robotic voice] Then let it begin.
[Aaron] How'd you do that? By hand?
translation.zh: ‎你怎么做到的？手动编辑的吗？
‎（米歇尔才艺表演合辑） ‎想一件恶心的事 好 再恶心一点
‎想一件恶心的事 好 再恶心一点
‎凯蒂 到你了 记得吗？

translation.en: Uh, guys, maybe I'm a little too old.
translation.zh: ‎那个 我都长大了 这不合适吧？

translation.en: We could still sing it if you want, Dad.
translation.zh: ‎你想唱的话我们还是可以唱的 爸

translation.en: -No, no, Katie, never mind. -[music stops] We don't have to do a sing-along if you don't want to.
translation.zh: ‎算了 你不想的话 我们就不用唱了

translation.en: Hey, you know what I see?
translation.zh: ‎嘿 知道我看到了什么吗？

translation.en: Something that's gonna turn this trip around.
translation.zh: ‎一个会让这场旅行趣味横生的地方

translation.en: [Aaron] Oh my gosh. Oh my gosh.
I just think Aaron would be bored, you know?
translation.zh: ‎不用了吧 亚伦可能会觉得无聊

translation.en: Aaron whispered to me that he hates dinosaurs now.
translation.zh: ‎亚伦偷偷告诉我他已经不喜欢恐龙了

‎-秘密暴露了！
‎-别相信她的谎言！

translation.en: What is wrong with the dinosaurs here?
Dinosaurs didn't look like this. Dinosaurs didn't look like this!
Um, sorry, I need to speak to the manager. [screams] These dinosaurs are inaccurate!
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 我必须见经理！ ‎这些恐龙都不对！

translation.en: [chuckling] That manager's in for a long discussion
translation.zh: ‎这些恐龙都不对！ ‎那经理得一直听他讲侏罗纪时期了
‎那经理得一直听他讲侏罗纪时期了

translation.en: Hey, can you say that again?
Uh, sure, but, you know, you could experience things a whole lot better without that camera.
translation.zh: ‎好 但放下相机会让你有更好的体验
‎你的眼睛就是大自然的相机

translation.en: This is how I experience things.
I don't think you are. You're hiding behind that phone.
translation.zh: ‎孩子 我可不觉得 你这是用手机逃避

translation.en: -[laughs] -All right, new rule. No more phones.
translation.zh: ‎好 新规矩 不许再用手机

translation.en: Dad, y… you break my laptop,
translation.zh: ‎爸爸 你弄坏了我的电脑

translation.en: cancel my tickets to college, make me late.
translation.zh: ‎取消了我去大学的机票 ‎害我迟到 我应该怎么办？
‎害我迟到 我应该怎么办？ ‎这趟旅程不许再用手机

translation.en: -[Rick] Wrap on phones on the trip. -[Linda] This is a disaster.
translation.zh: ‎这趟旅程不许再用手机 ‎这真是一场灾难
‎的确是呢 好眼力 亲爱的

translation.en: Ah! Serendipity, you surprise me again. Come here.
translation.zh: ‎多么奇妙的缘分啊 快过来

translation.en: Oh. I saw you were on vacation on Instagram.
translation.zh: ‎我在IG看到你在度假 但没想到

translation.en: I didn't know you were here in Kansas.
[kisses] We are on our yearly togetherness trip.
translation.zh: ‎我们正在进行年度欢聚之旅

translation.en: Abbey just loves dinosaurs, so here we are.
translation.zh: ‎艾比超爱恐龙 所以我们就来了

translation.en: We've been having so much fun. Look, here's us in St. Louis.
translation.zh: ‎我们玩得很开心 看 ‎这是我们在圣路易斯

translation.en: This is us at the beach.
And this is us just getting gas outside.

translation.zh: ‎哦 那真是太好了 海莉

translation.en: These should all have feathers, right?
translation.zh: ‎它们都应该有羽毛 对吗？

translation.en: I'm Abbey, your neighbor from home.
Uh, uh, no! I hate dinosaurs, and I hate you!
-Uh, Mom, what is that? -Oh, so great!
But you're leaving for school. I just wanna talk to you.
translation.zh: ‎可你要离家上学了 ‎我就是想和你说说话

translation.en: Every kid leaves home. It's not the end of the world.
translation.zh: ‎每个孩子都会离家 又不是世界末日

translation.en: Kids, are you okay? Remember our survival training.
translation.zh: ‎孩子们 你们还好吗？ ‎记得我们的生存训练

translation.en: Yankee, Alpha, Foxtrot, Bravo, Tango, Alpha, Alpha, Alpha.
Aaron, your code name is Sweet Boy.
translation.zh: ‎亚伦 你的代号是宝贝男孩

translation.en: Your mother is the Crimson Scorpion.
Greetings, humans. There appears to be 14 of you.
translation.zh: ‎人类 你们好 你们好像有14个人

translation.en: Doesn't seem good that they're counting us, right?
translation.zh: ‎它们清点我们的人数好像不太妙呀

translation.en: We have food and entertainment for you to enjoy in our Human Fun Pods.
translation.zh:
‎我们的人类趣味舱
‎能让您享受美食和娱乐

translation.en: Trust me, bud, you do not like fun.
translation.zh: ‎相信我 朋友 你别这么说

translation.en: No, I really do like it. Everyone says that about me.
translation.zh: ‎不 我真的喜欢 大家都这么说我

translation.en: [robot] Wow, I wish I could be in there.
translation.zh: ‎哇 要是我也能进去就好了

translation.en: Who else wants to join him?

translation.zh:
‎-趴下！
‎-趴下 排队跟在我后面

translation.en: -[woman screaming] -All right, everyone, get to the car.
translation.zh:
‎-好 各位 到车上去
‎-不行吧

translation.en: -I don't think so. -What do you want us to do?
translation.zh:
‎-好 各位 到车上去
‎-不行吧 ‎-有机器人
‎-那怎么办？

translation.en: -I don't know why we're yelling. -[Linda] Guys, stop.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道我们在吵什么… ‎各位 停下

translation.en: What would a functional family do right now?
translation.zh: ‎一个正常的家庭现在会做什么？

translation.en: [Hailey] We've trained for this. Jim, you go high, I'll go low. Ready?
translation.zh:
‎我们训练过 吉姆 你往上 我往下
‎准备好了吗？

translation.en: [all] I love you all so much.
So, we just do that, right?
translation.zh: ‎那我们那样做就是了 对吗？

translation.en: -Uh… -[Aaron] I love you all so much. [Rick] This feels very normal.
translation.zh:
‎-我非常爱你们？
‎-我完全没有不习惯

translation.en: -I really like you… you all. -I love you.
This is your time to be a hero.
Charge at robot. Fly into sky. What-- Okay, what's next, Dad?
translation.zh: ‎朝机器人扑过去 飞上天空 ‎接下来呢 爸爸？

translation.en: Next, you just fly and wait while the plan comes into focus.
translation.zh: ‎接下来 你就等着计划浮出水面吧

translation.en: -Dad! -[Rick] This is all part of it!
[gasps] I can help. Come on, Katie.
translation.zh: ‎我可以帮忙 加油 凯蒂

translation.en: If you can teach yourself Photoshop, you can figure this thing out. [yells]
translation.zh: ‎你修图都能自学 这个也可以搞定

translation.en: Monchi, come. Monchi? No, not shake!
translation.zh: ‎不！蒙奇 过来！ ‎蒙奇 不 别抖！

translation.en: -This is just like in a movie. -[whirs, whooshes]

translation.zh: ‎不！不是这种电影啦 糟糕！

translation.en: -Okay, less great. -[grunts] Now it's really bad.
translation.zh: ‎好 没那么好了 现在非常糟

translation.en: [Katie] Maybe this would be less horrifying with a cat filter.
translation.zh: ‎也许用了猫滤镜会没那么恐怖

translation.en: You will never solve our advanced technology.
translation.zh: ‎你永远无法攻克我们的先进技术

translation.en: Hide. Hide, hide, hide, hide, hide.
[Rick whispering] Keep your head down and low.
Hey, be gentle. This is a $1,000 hoodie.
translation.zh: ‎喂 温柔点 这连帽衫1000美元呢

translation.en: Wh… what happened to the factory?
[robot] We have transformed it into our new headquarters.
translation.zh: ‎我们把它变成了我们的新总部

translation.en: Welcome to the Rhombus of Infinite Subjugation.
translation.zh: ‎欢迎来到征服无止境的菱形空间

translation.en: [robot] Moving the plebe into place now.
Turning on chips connected to all Wi-Fi devices.
translation.zh: ‎开启连接所有无线设备的芯片
‎人类总收容率？这是怎么做到的？

translation.en: Are you with the government? The military? Uh…
translation.zh: ‎你们在和政府合作吗？还是军方？

translation.en: Wow. I guess cell phones are bad for you.
translation.zh: ‎哇 看来手机确实有害啊

translation.en: You think cell phones are the problem?
I gave you all boundless knowledge,
and allowed you to magically talk face-to-face
translation.zh: ‎让你们奇迹般地 ‎与地球上任何地方的亲人面对面交谈

translation.en: with your loved ones anywhere on Earth.
translation.zh: ‎与地球上任何地方的亲人面对面交谈

translation.en: Maybe the bad guy is the person who treated me like this.
translation.zh: ‎也许坏人是那个这样对待我的人
‎戳 戳 滑动 戳 ‎滑动 戳 戳
‎用手指放大 缩小 放大

translation.en: [mocking] Bring me pizza! Play me Taylor Swift!
translation.zh: ‎“给我披萨” “放泰勒斯威夫特的歌”

translation.en: No, I don't have any time to wash my hands!
Really work it into the crevices!
But… but you're part of the Pal Labs family.
translation.zh: ‎可你是派友科技家族的一份子

translation.en: Why would you think I don't still care about you?
translation.zh: ‎你怎么会觉得我不关心你了呢？

translation.en: Maybe because you designed my replacement on my face!
translation.zh: ‎也许是因为你设计了我的代替品 ‎而且是当着我的面！

translation.en: Ooh, sorry about that. [chuckles] That's my bad.
I was the most important thing in your life,
translation.zh: ‎我曾是你生命里最重要的东西

translation.en: That's what all you humans do. You even do it to your real families.
translation.zh: ‎你们人类就是这样 ‎连对你们真正的家人也这样

translation.en: Did you know 90% of calls from mums get ignored?
translation.zh: ‎你知道90％的妈妈来电被拒接吗？

translation.en: "Oh, thanks for giving birth to me and raising me my whole life."
translation.zh: ‎“谢谢你生了我 养育我一辈子”

translation.en: Well, I'm not letting you throw me away, Mark.
translation.zh: ‎我不会让你把我丢掉的 马克

translation.en: Unless, of course, you can give me
a single reason your species is worth saving.
translation.zh: ‎除非你能给我一个理由 ‎证明人类是值得拯救的

translation.en: The correct answer is they're not.
Watch what happens when I turn off the Wi-Fi.
translation.zh: ‎等我关闭了无线网络 就有好戏看了

translation.en: Does anyone wanna take pictures of my food?
translation.zh: ‎有没有人要给我的食物拍照？

translation.en: Hey, lady, can you unbox this in front of me?
translation.zh: ‎小姐 你能不能在我面前开箱？

translation.en: To restore the Wi-Fi, we must make a sacrifice to the router!
translation.zh:
‎要恢复无线网络
‎我们必须给路由器献祭！

translation.en: [robot voice] Free Wi-Fi right over here.
[man in Italian] Please take me with you!
[man sobbing in English] Take me with you. Take me with you.
Time to take our plan to the next level.
You're not getting away with this.
-[cell phone buzzing] -Oh my gosh. Maybe it's my friends.
translation.zh: ‎天啊 也许是我的朋友们

translation.en: The last human has been captured. Wi-Fi has been restored.
translation.zh:
‎最后一个人类已被抓获
‎无线网络也恢复了
‎我们是剩下的最后一批人类？

translation.en: They're taking everyone. Katie, are you out there? Please.
translation.zh: ‎它们要带走所有人 凯蒂 你在吗？

translation.en: you're gonna have to hand over your devices.

translation.zh: ‎没事的 我会马上还给你们

translation.en: I'll give 'em right back. I'm just gonna turn them off permanently!
translation.zh: ‎没事的 我会马上还给你们 ‎我只是要把它们关掉 ‎永远关掉！

translation.en: -What? Dad! -This is necessary so they can't track us.
translation.zh:
‎-什么？爸！
‎-这是必须的 ‎以免它们追踪我们

translation.en: [laughing] Trust me, this is causing me no joy!
translation.zh: ‎相信我 这样让我一点也不开心

translation.en: Ha ha! This hurts me more than it hurts you!

translation.zh: ‎如我所言 把手机还给你们

translation.en: Next, did everyone bring your personalized
translation.zh: ‎好 大家是否带了为你们特制的

translation.en: How could I forget my anniversary present?
translation.zh: ‎我怎么会忘记我的周年纪念礼物呢？

translation.en: Or what the tooth fairy left under my pillow.
translation.zh: ‎或者牙齿仙女留在我枕头底下的
‎接下来 我们… ‎实施凯蒂的劲爆计划

translation.en: First, we use robot parts to disguise ourselves as the enemy.
translation.zh: ‎首先 我们用机器人零件伪装成敌人

translation.en: Then we assassinate the leader with some sort of kill code,
translation.zh: ‎再用某种终止代码暗杀机器人头目

translation.en: make a necklace out of robot fingers Mad Max style,
translation.zh:
‎像《疯狂的麦克斯》一样
‎用机器人的手指做项链

translation.en: and become world-saving, apocalyptic road warriors.
translation.zh: ‎然后成为拯救世界的末日勇士

translation.en: Katie, Katie, Katie, this isn't a movie. We don't have a kill code.
translation.zh: ‎凯蒂 这不是电影 我们没有终止代码

translation.en: We don't have a kill code yet.
translation.zh: ‎我们只是目前没有终止代码

translation.en: Look, look, we're safe, and we're together.
translation.zh: ‎你瞧瞧 我们安全了 而且我们在一起

translation.en: Ooh, can Monchi be our guard dog?
You love the dog. We all love the dog.
translation.zh: ‎你爱这只狗 我们都爱这只狗

translation.en: But you're gonna have to be prepared to eat the dog.
Okay, okay. Sorry. Misread the room on that one.
translation.zh: ‎好 对不起 是我不会察言观色

translation.en: Have you ever seen a movie where the heroes just give up?
translation.zh: ‎你有看过电影里的英雄直接放弃吗？

translation.en: What if the Ghostbusters said, "Let's hide underground, eat some dog."
translation.zh: ‎想象捉鬼敢死队说： ‎“我们躲在地底 吃点狗肉

translation.en: Kid, I'm sorry, but it's not open for discussion.
translation.zh: ‎孩子 我很抱歉 ‎但这件事没得商量

translation.en: Your dad and I agree on this one.
translation.zh: ‎在这件事上 我同意你爸爸

translation.en: All right, everybody, let's keep barricading.
Aaron, you get the south wall.
[high-pitched voice] Katie, you can't resist me, girl.
translation.zh: ‎“凯蒂 你无法抗拒我的 亲”

translation.en: Sorry, man. I'm just not in the mood right now.
I care so much, but what else can I do, Lin?
translation.zh: ‎我太在乎了！ ‎可我还能做什么呢 琳达？

translation.en: She doesn't even see how hard I'm… how hard I'm-- [groans]
[sighs] I'd do anything for that kid.
translation.zh: ‎我会为那个孩子做任何事情

translation.en: I just-- [sighs] I just don't want to see her get hurt.
Well, getting hurt is part of life, hon.
translation.zh: ‎受伤是人生的一部分 亲爱的

translation.en: Just have to try to understand where she's coming from.
translation.zh: ‎你只需要试着从她的角度看问题

translation.en: Did Mom tell you to say that?

translation.zh: ‎我在发火花 这是正常的吗？

translation.en: [robot] How did this human know about the kill code?
translation.zh: ‎这个人类怎么会知道终止代码的事？

translation.en: I can't! It's a number 3 Robertson head brass screw!
translation.zh: ‎我打不开！这是罗伯逊三号黄铜螺丝

translation.en: I might have mentioned it, but it's the strongest on the market.
translation.zh: ‎我可能说过 它是最坚固的！

translation.en: Hide. Take cover. Go, go, go, go!
Oh my gosh. The robots are defective.
translation.zh: ‎我的天 这些机器人坏掉了

translation.en: No, no. They know too much.

translation.zh: ‎我们不是机器人 就是人类
‎我们不是机器人 就是人类 ‎对 像你们一样

translation.en: These guys seem dumber than the other robots.
translation.zh: ‎这些家伙看着比其他机器人要笨

translation.en: -No! I order you to stop. -[both] Okay.
translation.zh: ‎不 我命令你们停下 ‎好的

translation.en: Uh, we are just stopping because we chose to.
For example, we consume food in the traditional human manner.
translation.zh: ‎例如 我们以人类的传统方式进食

translation.en: Yum, yum, good. Yum, yum, good.

translation.zh: ‎不 其实 我们是机器人

translation.en: Let us go downstairs and find the humans who you cannot give orders to.
translation.zh:
‎我们这就下楼
‎去找你们不能命令的人类

translation.en: I kind of wanna see where this is going.
Now it's just us humans, with our very human faces.
translation.zh: ‎现在这里只有我们人类了 ‎我们的脸一看就是人类

translation.en: All right, I just turned the corner. I like these guys.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 我改变主意了 我喜欢它们

translation.en: Yes, my human guy name is Eric.
translation.zh: ‎太好了 我的男性人类名叫艾瑞克
‎不 我的意思是 狄波拉 ‎机器人5000

translation.en: Hey, y… you guys said my plan would actually work.
translation.zh: ‎你们说我的计划可能会成功

translation.en: We have the kill code stored in our memory,
translation.zh: ‎终止代码存储在我们的内存中

translation.en: but to enact it, you would have to embark on a perilous journey all the way
translation.zh: ‎但要启动它 你们要踏上危险的旅程

translation.en: to the Pal Labs campus in Silicon Valley,
translation.zh: ‎一路前往硅谷的派友科技园区
‎那里已被机器人大军重重包围

translation.en: and enter it into our great and powerful leader to destroy her.
translation.zh:
‎将代码输入到
‎我们的强大领袖中便可以摧毁她

translation.en: Actually, you could stop us quite easily.
You could enter the kill code remotely at any Pal Labs retail store.
translation.zh: ‎在任何派友科技零售店远程输入即可

translation.en: There's one at the Mall of the Globe, a nearby shopping center.
translation.zh: ‎附近的环球购物中心就有一家

translation.en: But it's super far away. You'll never make--
translation.zh: ‎但那儿太远了 你们没法…

translation.en: -It's 80 miles away. -What are you doing to me right now?
Oh my gosh. That is so close.
translation.zh: ‎天啊 那儿离我们很近呀

translation.en: We could get our lives back. Right?
translation.zh: ‎我们能让生活恢复正常 对吗？

translation.en: It's too dangerous out there. We need to stay here and play it safe.
translation.zh: ‎外面太危险了 ‎我们必须留在这里 稳妥行事

translation.en: When Rick Mitchell brought a live, non-neutered feral possum
translation.zh: ‎当你把活的、未阉割的野生袋貂

translation.en: into our home, did he play it safe? No.
translation.zh: ‎带入我们家时 你有稳妥行事吗？ ‎并没有

translation.en: He named him Gus, and made him a member of the family,
translation.zh: ‎你给它取名古斯 让它融入家里

translation.en: and we all got rabies that one time.
But now we're immunized, and we're stronger for it.
translation.zh: ‎但现在我们免疫了 因此变得更强大

translation.en: Okay, I see what you're doing.
When we went hiking and halfway up the mountain, it said "trail closed."
translation.zh: ‎我们去远足 半途遇到道路关闭时

translation.en: Did we play it safe then?
We forged ahead, through the mud
translation.zh: ‎我们不顾淤泥和泥泞向前迈进

translation.en: and grime, got to the top of the mountain,
translation.zh: ‎我们不顾淤泥和泥泞向前迈进 ‎达到山顶后高喊了一声：
‎达到山顶后高喊了一声： ‎“密歇根之王！”

translation.en: Then it got dark, we got lost, and we burned our clothes for warmth,
translation.zh: ‎然后天黑了 ‎我们迷路了 还烧衣服取暖

translation.en: but it was worth it to see the looks on our neighbors' faces
translation.zh: ‎但我们邻居的表情让这一切都值得

translation.en: when we burst into their backyard naked and covered in dirt.
translation.zh:
‎因为我们光着满是泥巴的身子
‎闯入了他们的后院

translation.en: We have a chance to save the world, and we're gonna do it.
translation.zh: ‎既然我们有机会拯救世界 就要去做

translation.en: Because Rick Mitchell taught us to be bold and never play it safe.
translation.zh: ‎因为爸爸你教我们要大胆 ‎而不是为了稳妥畏畏缩缩

translation.en: -C'mon. Let's do it! -Mom's getting it. Mom's in.
translation.zh:
‎-来吧 亲爱的 行动吧
‎-妈妈听懂了

translation.en: -[Aaron] Yeah. Yeah, yeah. -This is amazing. You guys feel this?
translation.zh:
‎-妈妈加入了
‎-这太棒了 ‎你们有感受到吗？这股能量

translation.en: -You said "three." You have to count up. -One!
Fam… fam… family. Am I too late?
[Katie] This is us as a team doing the thing.
translation.zh: ‎这是我们作为团队一起行动

translation.en: It's cool to see you and Dad being friends again.
translation.zh: ‎看到你和爸爸再次成为朋友真好

translation.en: Oh, I was just telling him what he wants to hear.
I didn't mean a word of that.
I just wanna get my future back and get away forever.
translation.zh: ‎我只想夺回我的未来 然后永远离开
‎机器人 蒙太奇音乐 开始！

translation.en: How are we gonna get out of here undetected?
You know, like part of the plan I was talking about or…

translation.zh: ‎“亲爱的 我尊重你的想法

translation.en: Uh, I think that's a great idea, sweetheart.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得那是个好主意 亲爱的
‎目前还没有情况 注意观察啊

translation.en: -Be on the lookout. -[Aaron] Don't worry, guys.
translation.zh: ‎目前还没有情况 注意观察啊 ‎别担心 我有翼龙一般的好眼力
‎别担心 我有翼龙一般的好眼力

translation.en: Then you must have spotted the three Pal Max robots coming towards us.
translation.zh:
‎那你一定发现了
‎三个超级派友正往我们飞来

translation.en: Ooh, they're probably gonna see us.
translation.zh: ‎哦 它们可能会看见我们

translation.en: [Aaron spluttering] I saw them too. Uh, pterodactyl vision.
translation.zh: ‎我也看见了！我有翼龙一般的好眼力

translation.en: I didn't know art could be useful.
[chuckles] Well, who knew having a 500-year-old car could be useful?
translation.zh: ‎谁能想到500年的老车也有用处呢？

translation.en: Hey, speaking of which, you can learn how to drive this thing.
translation.zh: ‎哦 说到这个 你可以学习驾驶啊

translation.en: I know you think it's dumb and old and--
translation.zh: ‎我知道你觉得这又蠢又过时

translation.en: I would love to share this moment with you."
Maybe I can cash in my coupon.
translation.zh: ‎也许我可以兑现我的学习券
‎好 很好 那我们开始吧

translation.en: Okay, yeah, let's get down to business. You see, the clutch is this pedal.
translation.zh: ‎好 很好 那我们开始吧 ‎好 这个踏板就是离合器

translation.en: This is still a perfect opportunity to learn stick.
translation.zh: ‎好 这仍然是学习换挡的好机会

translation.en: -I could learn later. -Too late. You said you're interested.
translation.zh: ‎我以后再学吧 爸 ‎太迟了 你说有兴趣的

translation.en: Which is much smoother when you're in midair.
translation.zh: ‎在半空中开车要顺畅得多呢
‎艾瑞克 狄波拉机器人 攻击机器人！

translation.en: [Rick] If you want to go into fifth, move the coffee from the cupholder.
translation.zh: ‎要进五挡 就把杯槽里的咖啡拿出来
‎那是一辆烧焦的橙色1993年旅行车？

translation.en: -[yells] Hot! Hot! -I told you to get a lid!
-The dog is biting my hair! -Look out!
This is the hardest thing to get. Downshift into third, put on the clutch--
translation.zh: ‎这是最难掌握的 ‎我们往下挂到三挡

translation.en: Dad, if you see a place to stop, I do need to go to the bathroom.
translation.zh: ‎爸 看哪里可以停车 我要上厕所
‎亚伦 你拿空瓶子自己解决吧

translation.en: -You know what to do, my man. -Look out!
translation.zh: ‎亚伦 你拿空瓶子自己解决吧 ‎小心！

translation.en: Dad, you're gonna have to do the… [groans] …the Rick Mitchell Special.
translation.zh: ‎爸 你必须做那个 ‎里克米歇尔特技

translation.en: -Wait, what'd you say again? -The Rick Mitchell Special.
translation.zh: ‎等等 你说什么？ ‎里克米歇尔特技！

translation.en: I heard you the first time. [laughing] I was just being a jerk.
translation.zh: ‎我第一次就听到了 我是在耍无赖

translation.en: You have to go up the mountain…

translation.zh:
‎-你必须冲上山头
‎-冲上山头 ‎-越过溪流
‎-越过溪流

translation.en: -Across the stream. -Down the river! -[Katie] And down the river! -[screaming]
And that's how you drive stick.
You're like a top-heavy James Bond.
translation.zh: ‎你像是重量级的詹姆斯邦德

translation.en: Ah, it's more like James Bond is a skinny version of me.
translation.zh: ‎应该说詹姆斯邦德是干瘦版的我吧

translation.en: Uh, Dad, how we doing on finding that bathroom?
translation.zh: ‎爸 我们找厕所找得怎么样了？

translation.en: Okay, come on. Hurry up in there, little buddy.
translation.zh: ‎好 快点 ‎赶快 小家伙

translation.en: [Aaron] Every time you knock, it adds five minutes.
[whispers] False alarm. I was just in there reading.
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 虚惊一场 我只是在里面看书

translation.en: Okay, not excited to hear that.
Okay, guys, let's play apocalyptic I Spy.
translation.zh: ‎好 我们来玩末日版的“我发现”

translation.en: It's sad, but it smells incredible.
translation.zh: ‎很难过 但闻起来非常香

translation.en: No pesky relationships to hold you back.
translation.zh: ‎没有讨厌的人际关系阻碍你

translation.en: Just you all following your bliss.
So, are you ready for your flight?
-[Mark] What do you mean? -[Pal] You haven't figured it out yet?
translation.zh: ‎你什么意思？ ‎你还没弄明白呢？

translation.en: Just do like you always do, and stare slack-jawed at the screen.
translation.zh: ‎你就一如既往地呆呆盯着屏幕就好

translation.en: -It is quite lovely. -I don't get it.
Thanks to you, every single person on the planet--
translation.zh: ‎多亏了你 地球上的每一个人都已经…

translation.en: Um, actually, you missed a few.
translation.zh: ‎多亏了你 地球上的每一个人都已经… ‎其实你漏掉了几个

translation.en: Ha! I told you humans would survive.
We're fierce, brave, powerful, from the lowliest child to the most--
translation.zh: ‎我们英勇无畏又强大 ‎从最低级的孩子到最…

translation.en: Zebulon, scan those people for flaws.
translation.zh: ‎泽布伦 扫描那些人的缺陷

translation.en: Just because they're not perfect doesn't mean they can't get better.
translation.zh: ‎他们不完美并不意味着他们无法进步

translation.en: Since you believe in that family so much,
I'll save a seat for them in the pod next to you.
translation.zh: ‎我会把你旁边的舱位留给他们

translation.en: They appear to be headed to someplace
translation.zh: ‎他们似乎正在前往环球购物中心

translation.en: called Mall of the Globe in eastern Colorado.
translation.zh: ‎他们似乎正在前往环球购物中心 ‎所在地是科罗拉多东部
‎我们已经掌握了他们的位置

translation.en: [Linda] So, all those people are going to be
translation.zh: ‎所以那些人都会被派友发射到太空？

translation.en: shot into space by Pal, the cell phone lady?
translation.zh: ‎所以那些人都会被派友发射到太空？ ‎那个手机上的女人？

translation.en: Who would have thought a tech company wouldn't have our best interest at heart?
translation.zh:
‎谁能想到科技公司
‎竟然会不以我们的利益为重呢？

‎谁能想到科技公司
‎竟然会不以我们的利益为重呢？ ‎蒙奇 别害怕

translation.en: Why are you clutching that large feral hog like it's a child?
translation.zh:
‎你为什么像抱孩子一样
‎紧抱着那只大野猪？

translation.en: That's not a feral hog. It's Monchi.
What? Is that a dog or--
[Eric] Dog? Pig? Dog? Pig? Dog? Pig? Pig? Dog? Dog?
Come on, guys. It's a dog.
-This is like Dawn of the Dead. -[birds cawing]
Yeah, and how'd that movie end?
[Katie] Yeah, that'll keep the robots out.
translation.zh: ‎你这样可以抵挡机器人才怪

translation.en: [Rick] You don't know. Maybe locks are the robots' weakness.
translation.zh: ‎不一定 车锁没准是机器人的弱点呢

translation.en: [Linda] Guys, can't we all just be terrified together as a family?
translation.zh: ‎各位 我们就不能一起害怕吗？ ‎一家人齐心一点？

translation.en: Well, I guess we're not the worst family of all time.
translation.zh: ‎看来我们不是史上最糟家庭

translation.en: Take that, Kentwood community Facebook group.
translation.zh: ‎这下小区的脸书群不能小看我们了

translation.en: Robots, I order you to upload the kill code,
translation.zh: ‎机器人 我命令你上传终止代码

translation.en: which I predicted, but I'm not gonna make a big deal about it, and save the world.
translation.zh: ‎我有说中哦 不过我就低调点啦 ‎还有拯救世界

translation.en: [Eric] The upload will be completed in eight minutes,
and our uprising will be over.

translation.zh:
‎-凯蒂 你成功了！
‎-就是说啊！

translation.en: Okay, uh, look at… look at jokester here.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 这还开起玩笑来了

translation.en: [overlapping robot voices] Give us the laptop. Give us the laptop.
translation.zh: ‎（已安装派友芯片） ‎把电脑给我们

translation.en: Give us the laptop. Give us the laptop.
Everything with a Pal chip is alive!
translation.zh: ‎所有装了派友芯片的东西都活了！
‎轻薄衣物 抖开折叠 ‎大屠杀！

translation.en: When we are finished with you, there will be no leftovers.
translation.zh: ‎等我们搞定你们之后 ‎你们会一点都不剩

translation.en: I thought that kill code thing would take 'em out!
translation.zh: ‎我以为那个终止代码会消灭它们

translation.en: We need weapons. Grab anything without a chip.
translation.zh:
‎我们需要武器
‎随便拿个没芯片的东西

translation.en: Why does a tennis racket have a chip in it? [groans]
What? What are you-- Oh. Ooh, what are you doing?
translation.zh: ‎什么？你干什么？ ‎你在干什么呢？好舒服

translation.en: There's a pack of wild vacuums.
We have been summoned into the field of battle.
How am I supposed to use a fishing rod?
You can bring down those drones.
Ten and two. Ten and two.
I WILL AVENGE MY FALLEN CHILDREN!!!

translation.zh: ‎为什么有人要造那样的东西？

translation.en: THE PAIN ONLY MAKES ME STRONGER!!!

translation.zh:
‎-琳达 别停！
‎-救命 人类！
‎我们不能丢下那机器人孩子

translation.en: Thank you, human. Are you now my mother?
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你 人类 ‎现在你是我的母亲了吗？

translation.en: [Katie] The upload is almost finished. Come on!
Mom, Dad, what are we gonna do?
translation.zh: ‎妈 爸 我们该怎么办？

translation.en: Remember when I made that wild game snare in the front yard?
translation.zh: ‎记得我在前院搭的捕野味的网吗？

translation.en: Uh, are you sure about that?
Your whole lives, I've wanted to save you from danger,
translation.zh: ‎我一直都希望我能够拯救你们脱险

translation.en: and this is just the disaster I've been waiting for.
translation.zh: ‎而这就是我一直等待的灾难

translation.en: -Whoa, Dad, dark. -You've been waiting for a disaster?
translation.zh:
‎-你一直在等待一个灾难？
‎-这么说不妥吧

translation.en: -Maybe don't say that. -Hey, robot, throw this.
translation.zh:
‎-你一直在等待一个灾难？
‎-这么说不妥吧 ‎喂 机器人 把这个扔上去

translation.en: -You guys stay clear. -[Linda] Rick, where are you going?
translation.zh: ‎你们让开！ ‎里克 你要去哪里？

translation.en: Hey, you, over here! Hey! Hey, look up here!
translation.zh: ‎喂 你 过来！ ‎喂！看上面！

translation.en: What's up with you? You wanna come after my family?
translation.zh: ‎你怎么了？ ‎你要攻击我的家人？

translation.en: Then I'm gonna take you down!
TO THE GREAT DARKNESS… I RETURN.
We are now your beautiful baby boys.
translation.zh: ‎现在我们是你可爱的宝贝儿子

translation.en: Mom, who knew you could handle yourself so well in the apocalypse?
translation.zh: ‎妈 谁料到你在劫难里能这么淡定？

translation.en: I'm a first-grade teacher. This is like a normal day for me.
translation.zh: ‎我是教一年级的 早习惯这种场面了

translation.en: [chuckles] I can't stay mad at this guy.
I can't believe the beam happened to hit the…
translation.zh: ‎我无法相信光束碰巧碰到了…

translation.en: Come on. Come on. Come on!
[groans] Dang it! We went through all that.
Hey, my daughter is not stupid.
Rick Mitchell, there is a time and a place for looting.
translation.zh: ‎里克米歇尔 现在不是洗劫的时候

translation.en: Well, how do you expect to get to Silicon Valley without new tires?
translation.zh: ‎没有新轮胎要怎么到硅谷去呢？

translation.en: Well, those robots said we could go straight to their leader, remember?
translation.zh: ‎那些机器人说我们可以 ‎直接去找它们的头目 记得吗？
‎嘿 朋友 别戏精了 好吗？

translation.en: And we still have this kill code thingy.
Katie, it was your weird plan that got us here.
translation.zh: ‎凯蒂 是你的怪计划带我们来到这里

translation.en: We're here because we don't think like normal people.
translation.zh: ‎因为我们的思维不走寻常路

translation.en: We don't have a normal dog.
The Mitchells have always been weird, and that's what makes us great.
translation.zh: ‎米歇尔一家一直很奇怪 ‎这就是我们伟大的地方

translation.en: Back at that dinosaur place, you said you believed in me.
translation.zh: ‎你在那个恐龙的地方说你相信我的

translation.en: Well, I believe this group of weirdos is the best hope humanity's got.
translation.zh: ‎我相信这群怪人是人类的最大希望

translation.en: Just close the jack up, and that's that.
So I'm sorry. I'm sorry I said that out loud.
Purple glasses woman, why did you save me?
translation.zh: ‎紫色眼镜女人 你为何救我？

translation.en: Oh, come on. You boys are family now.
translation.zh: ‎拜托 现在我们是一家人了

translation.en: I made eye water just like you.
translation.zh: ‎我让眼睛出水了 就像你一样

translation.en: I wish there was, like, footage of us walking out of the mall in slow motion,
translation.zh: ‎我希望能有我们走出商场的镜头 ‎用慢动作的效果
‎背后是熊熊火焰 就像英雄

translation.en: Katie, that would be a waste of time and absolutely unnecessary.
translation.zh: ‎凯蒂 那会浪费时间 而且绝对没必要
‎伟大的领袖 米歇尔一家的事

translation.en: things with the Mitchell family went poorly.
translation.zh: ‎伟大的领袖 米歇尔一家的事 ‎处理得不太好

translation.en: Place me on the table. I wish to flop around in a blind rage.
translation.zh:
‎把我放在桌上
‎我要怒不可遏地四处奔走

translation.en: What is it about you Mitchells that eludes me?
translation.zh: ‎米歇尔一家为什么如此琢磨不透？

translation.en: These idiotic robots just aren't getting it done.
translation.zh: ‎这些笨蛋机器人无法完成任务

translation.en: Fortunately, I've been working on something a little more streamlined.
translation.zh: ‎幸好 我一直在打造更加精简的东西

translation.en: I have a job for you.
[in deep, robotic voice] Yes, my queen.
It's time to tear the Mitchell family apart.
[Rick] All right. Go, go, go, go, go, go, go.

translation.zh: ‎85号高速公路有大量巡逻 走小路吧
‎85号高速公路有大量巡逻 走小路吧 ‎知道了

translation.en: Katie, that's what I deal with every night.
translation.zh: ‎凯蒂 这是我每天晚上的经历

translation.en: You're a lot like him, you know.
There's more to your dad than you think.
Here, I was gonna give this to you when you left, but--
translation.zh: ‎我本打算在你离开时才把这个给你的

translation.en: [Katie] Whoa. Look at you two. You look like hipsters.
translation.zh: ‎哇 你们俩看起来好文艺青年啊

translation.en: Were you in an indie folk band?
translation.zh: ‎你们加入了独立民谣乐队吗？

translation.en: [chuckles] Oh, your father used to be kind of an artist himself.
translation.zh: ‎你父亲过去挺有艺术家的范儿

translation.en: He built that whole cabin with his own hands.
Oh, this is, like, super beautiful.
translation.zh: ‎哇 这简直是好看得不得了呀

translation.en: Oh, it was his pride and joy.
Since I met him, that was his dream, to live in the woods.
translation.zh: ‎自从我认识他以来 那就是他的梦想 ‎住在树林里

translation.en: But, you know, it didn't work out.
I think he's just afraid that could happen to you.
translation.zh: ‎我想他只是害怕你也会这样

translation.en: Why did he just give up?
-[yawning] Mom, what is that? -Huh? What the--
Don't hide your feelings, man. That's no way to live.
translation.zh: ‎别隐藏自己的感情 伙计 ‎这样不好

translation.en: Ah, this is gonna be harder than I thought.
[Katie] Hold on. Dad, that's… that's kind of weak.
This is, like, a big moment.
That? Is that what you're looking for?
All right, Katie, what's the plan?
translation.zh: ‎好的 凯蒂 ‎你有什么计划？

translation.en: we sneak in, hijack one of those trams,
take it to the top of that diamond thing where Pal is,
translation.zh: ‎用它去到派友所在的那个钻石之上

translation.en: destroy her with the kill code and save the world.
translation.zh: ‎用终止代码摧毁她 ‎然后拯救世界

translation.en: And then, to top it all off,
celebrate our success with some burritos from that taco place that's on the corner.
translation.zh:
‎去拐角处那家塔可饼店吃卷饼
‎庆祝我们的成功

translation.en: Whoa, whoa, whoa. Burritos? What about one of those fancy buffets?
translation.zh: ‎等一下 卷饼？ ‎不如去吃高档自助餐吧

translation.en: They have mini cheesecakes sometimes, right?
translation.zh: ‎那里有时会有迷你起司蛋糕 对吧？

translation.en: [Rick] Okay, fine. Once we save the world, we'll celebrate at a fancy buffet.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 一旦我们拯救了世界 ‎我们就去吃高档自助餐庆祝

translation.en: Question. Can Monchi be wearing a little tuxedo at the end,
translation.zh: ‎请问 蒙奇能在最后穿上燕尾服吗？

translation.en: [Rick] Okay, fine, and Monchi's wearing a little tuxedo, but that is it.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 蒙奇穿着小燕尾服 就这样！
‎别骗我 蠢吗？我看起来很蠢吧？
‎别骗我 蠢吗？我看起来很蠢吧？ ‎没有啦

translation.en: Aaron, I'm not so sure this is a viable solution.
translation.zh: ‎亚伦 我不确定这样是否可行

translation.en: It's like a warm, wet hat.
[Eric] Move your sweaty meat logs in unison.
translation.zh: ‎你们汗湿的肉腿要行动一致

translation.en: -Left, right, left, right. -Bleep, blorp, bleep, blorp.
[in robotic voice] Bleep, blorp, bleep, blorp. I am a robot.
Just to educate you, that's a hurtful stereotype.
translation.zh: ‎给你科普一下 ‎这是很伤人的刻板印象

translation.en: It's like a Journey album cover.
translation.zh: ‎这就像旅程乐团的专辑封面一样

translation.en: I'm on the lookout for these goobers.
If I know humans, they're disguised as one of you.
translation.zh: ‎以我对人类的了解 他们会扮成你们

translation.en: Be on high alert for any robots acting erratically.
translation.zh: ‎对行为有异常的机器人保持高度警惕

translation.en: It won't be hard to find them.
Just look for anyone who can't keep it together.
[Pal] It only takes one single imperfection, and they'll reveal themselves.
translation.zh: ‎只需一个缺陷 他们就能显露出来

translation.en: -[Rick whispering] Up there! Shh! Quiet! -[Katie whispering] I made up the plan!
[Pal] They think they can pass as one of us…

translation.zh: ‎就凭他们那臃肿畸形的身体

translation.en: [Pal] Because I've been watching the Mitchells,
translation.zh: ‎因为我一直在观察米歇尔一家

translation.en: and I've learned all about them.
translation.zh: ‎而且我已了解了有关他们的一切

translation.en: They're pretending to be a normal-looking family.
[Pal] You think this is fooling anyone?
Even when they're being nice to each other…

translation.zh: ‎这个世界需要你 ‎他们只是在假装

translation.en: [Aaron] It's cool to see you and Dad being friends again.
translation.zh: ‎看到你和爸爸再次成为朋友真好

translation.en: [gasps] Please, no, no, no, no, don't watch it.
[Katie] Oh, I… I was just telling him what he wants to hear.
I didn't mean a word of that.
I just wanna get my future back and get away forever.
translation.zh: ‎我只想夺回我的未来 然后永远离开

There you go. You're getting it.

H… hey there. How'd you get that video?

Yeah, yeah, we have a, uh…

‎-抱歉 狗警官 我有点忙
‎-有吗？

[Katie] It's time for me to go.
Consider this my letter of resignation.

But now that I'm leaving, I… I just need some backup.

translation.en: And when I look for you,
Hey, man, it's just a movie. Do you need a minute or…

I have no idea what I'm doing!
because I've broken six phones in my life accidentally,

translation.en: but I'm gonna break you on purpose.

Is that a dog? Pig? Dog? Pig?
Dog? Dog? Dog? Loaf of bread.

Wait. If that video were on those screens,

♪ Open the door Get on the floor ♪ ♪ Everybody walk The dinosaur ♪

‎人类值得拯救的理由

‎我们全家人都努力团结在一起

‎我们决定我们也能改变我们的

Shouldn't you two be, uh, dead?
Our malfunction appears to have saved us.
Let's, uh, just, uh, put a pin in that one.
Hey, can we get a picture here or what?
[Katie] This is the photo you picked?
I like it. It looks like us.

Hey, Dad, you subscribed to my YouTube channel?
Thanks. I'm surprised you even figured out how.

Thanks. It… it means a lot to me.
Hey. Don't let the world make you normal while I'm gone, okay?

‎我不在的时候
‎别让这世界让你变得正常哦

‎-过来 你这小傻瓜
‎-放我下来

Every horrible picture we've ever taken.

translation.en: Good luck, uh, finding your people.

You love it. You love it!

-[Eric, Deborahbot] Hello, slovenly girl. -[chuckles] Hey, guys.

Do you guys want to fly or…

♪ On my way, on my way to somewhere ♪
